com.ulflander.application.model
Class Paragraph

java.lang.Object
  com.ulflander.application.model.Text
      com.ulflander.application.model.Paragraph
Direct Known Subclasses:
Heading, ListItem
public class Paragraph
extends Text

A paragraph contains sentences and is contained into chapters.

Since:
2/24/14
Author:
Ulflander

          Create a new paragraph with an empty content.

          Create a paragraph with given content.

getTokenAt

public final Token getTokenAt(int sentencePos,
                              int pos)
Get token at given sentence index and token index - WILL throw an exception if sentence does not exist.

Parameters:
sentencePos - Index of sentence in paragraph
pos - Index of token in sentence
Returns:
Token if exist, null otherwise, throws error if sentence does not exist
